paper_abstract: In this paper it is proved that in the random graph model G(n,p), the property of containing a k -regular subgraph, has a sharp threshold for k 3. It is also shown how to use similar methods to prove, quite easily, the (known fact of) sharpness of having a non empty k -core for k 3. (c) 2012 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Random Struct. Alg., 42, 509519, 2013
paper_title: The property of having a k -regular subgraph has a sharp threshold
